title: President Donald J. Trump Announces Intent to Appoint Individuals to Key Administration Posts â€“ The White House
content:
Nominations & Appointments			
Issued on:
October 2, 2020
Today, President Donald J. Trump announced his intent to appoint the following individuals to key positions in his Administration:Thomas Fitton, of the District of Columbia, to be a Member of the District of Columbia Commission on Judicial Disabilities and Tenure.Laurence Allen Elder, of California, to be a Member of the Commission on the Social Status of Black Men and Boys.Loren Robert Flaum, of New York, to be a Member of the United States Holocaust Memorial Council.Bill H. Stern, of South Carolina, to be a Member of the United States Holocaust Memorial Council.
